name: It's All About The Journey (Certainly Not About Carl)
name_original: It's All About The Journey (Certainly Not About Carl)
description:
/!\ If you are experiencing lag in the web version please find the download version below. /!\

Help Carl navigate through his dreams by rocking his world around.

Keyboard Controls

Left/Right Arrows = tilt the level left or right.

Shift = boost tilt.

Space = jump.

R = panic reset the level.

Controller Controls

Left/Right Dpad = tilt the level left or right.

R1/L1 = boost tilt.

X/A button = jump.
